high_descs: Turn around and head towards the desk.
Pick up the pen closest to the wall.
Turn right and head towards the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pen next to the light of a lamp.

high_descs: look down, turn right, and walk to the desk
pick up the pencil that is on the CD
look down, turn right, and walk to the bedside table
turn on the lamp on the bedside table while carrying pencil
anns.task_desc: pick up a pencil to turn on the lamp while carrying a pencil

high_descs: Turn around and cross the room to the wooden desk.
Pick up the black pen on the top shelf to the left of the far left clock.
Turn around and hang a left at the white door to reach the small side table next to the bed.
Turn on the small lamp on top of the side table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pen by the light of a small lamp.
